definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: He also describes innumerous situations when he was helped by nonphysical entities.
sentences.chinese: 他也描述了无数次得到非肉身实体帮助的情形。

sentences.english: The flesh-body bodhisattva in Chinese Buddhism is a peculiar phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: “肉身菩萨”在中国佛教中是一个相当奇特的现象。

sentences.english: Your Incarnation fills me with hope.
sentences.chinese: 袮道成肉身用希望填充我们。

sentences.english: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you.
sentences.chinese: 然而我在肉身活着，为你们更是要紧的。

sentences.english: It humanizes the whole world through it's own specific thinking.
sentences.chinese: 它通过自己独特的肉身化思维，把整个世界人化。

sentences.english: But we do worship the Lord of creation, the Word of God who has become incarnate.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我们确实敬拜造物主，成为肉身之神的道。

sentences.english: To save us, God sent Jesus down to earth to become a man.
sentences.chinese: 神为了拯救我们，差派耶稣道成肉身，降世为人。

sentences.english: You are a non-physical point of consciousness floating in space.
sentences.chinese: 你是在空中飘浮的一个非肉身的意识点。

sentences.english: TheWord of God incarnate is the absolute norm for all mankind.
The name Jesus is the human name of the incarnates Son of God.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣的名字，是道成肉身圣子的人类名字。

sentences.english: What are the similarities and differences between personified wisdom and the incarnated Lord Jesus Christ?
sentences.chinese: 被拟人化的智慧与道成肉身的主耶稣基督有哪些异同？

sentences.english: Action Parinirvana possesses two kinds, which may have the two carnal bodies or four carnal bodies.
sentences.chinese: 行动涅磐有两类，这有两种肉身或四种肉体。

sentences.english: Compared to human mortality, spiritual deadness is much more devastating.
sentences.chinese: 与肉身的必死相比，精神的灭亡更具毁灭性。

sentences.english: I is for Incarnation, God became a man.
China IP all means return flesh and impulse honor between honor wounded.
sentences.chinese: 华用尽方法激荣交回肉身，冲动间打伤荣。

sentences.english: They came to worship the one and only God who had come in human body.
sentences.chinese: 他们前来敬拜那位道成肉身，唯一的真神。

definition: main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
